aboutme: Hi, my name is Ignacio, i'm currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science in FAMAF - UNC. My interests right now are web development (specifically positions related to full-stack or frontend development) and game development. Since April 2025, I have been working as a Frontend Developer at Inverte Global.
projects-body: Here you can see some of the projects I have worked on
footer: This Website was made with React, Redux, i18n and built with Vite
elswitcher-description: Implementation of the "El Switcher" Board Game, into a web application for the Software Engineering I Course at my College. All the development was done under the SCRUM Agile Methodology. It has both a frontend and a backend application, communicated by a REST API and WebSockets.
